sentences.sentence: He remembered the strange solitariness of her existence in London; her even stranger indifference to this solitariness.
sentences.translation: 他记得她呆在伦敦时那种奇特的孤独；更奇特的是她对孤独的无视。

sentences.sentence: He remembered the strange solitariness of her existence in London; her even stranger indifference to this solitariness.
sentences.translation: 他记起她在伦敦奇怪地独自一人，而更奇怪的是她对这种孤独的漠然。

sentences.sentence: The spontaneity, informality and solitariness of email make it more beguiling than lethal: E-mail tempts us to be ourselves.
sentences.translation: 电邮的自发性、随意性和孤独性，使其更具消遣意味，而非致命的威胁感：电邮促使我们表现真实的自己。
